scripts.test:e2e: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const root=path.join(process.cwd(),'tests','e2e');const ex=fs.existsSync(root)&&fs.statSync(root).isDirectory();function hasTests(dir){for(const ent of fs.readdirSync(dir,{withFileTypes:true})){const p=path.join(dir,ent.name);if(ent.isDirectory()){if(hasTests(p))return true;}else if(/\.(spec|test)\.(js|ts|jsx|tsx)$/.test(ent.name))return true;}return false;}process.exit(ex&&hasTests(root)?0:1);" && playwright test || node -e "console.log('tests/e2e 下没有 Playwright 用例，跳过');process.exit(0);"
